content: RSLab :::: MENU :::: First radargram from Juice’s RIME instrument Crop mapping for food security TOP RSLab News Jing Zhang got PhD On June 18, Jing Zhang has succesfully defended her PhD Thesis on "Semantic Change Detection in Multitemporal Remote Sensing Images Read more PhD positions @ RSLab RSLab is looking for strongly motivated candidate PhD students having excellent study career and interested in research activities in artificial Read more RIME Achieves Major Milestone with First Focused Radargram A major milestone has been reached by RIME (Radar for Icy Moon Exploration), the radar sounder aboard ESA’s JUICE (JUpiter Read more 2025 RIME Science Team Meeting On May 5–6, 2025, the RIME (Radar for Icy Moons Exploration) Science Team gathered to review progress and plan next Read more Raktim Ghosh got PhD On April 17, Raktim Ghosh has succesfully defended cum laude his PhD Thesis on "Novel Architectures for Radar Sounder Signals Read more Best PhD Theses Khatereh Meshkini received the 2024 “Frank Marzano” award for the Best Italian PhD Theses on Geoscience and Remote Sensing by Read more Annual review of the ESA CCI + HRLC project! The HRLC CCI studies and investigates the role of the spatial resolution of land cover and land cover change in Read more RSLab numbers in 2024 The 2024 was a very dense and exciting year at RSLab UniTrento with different activities on both Earth Observation and Read more Higly Citated Researcher 2024 Lorenzo Bruzzone has been recognized for the third consecutive year as a Highly Cited Researher by Clarivariate for 2024.
